name: DROL Playing Game
description:
WASD to move, Click the top right icons to get to the menu and the icons at the top to get to the equipment screen.  Be sure to equip the sword.

I made this in RPG-in-a-Box in the last day and it was fun and a cool learning experience.  RPG-in-a-Box is a particularly accessible way to make an RPG.   I had hoped to get the game working on mac but no such luck.
